verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> [standing] <S%G455>open<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I had <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> [the sound] of a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> with me, <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G305>"Come<s%> up <S%G5602>here,<s%> and I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>"

<S%G2112>Immediately<s%> I was in the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2362>throne<s%> was <S%G2749>standing<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and One <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And He who was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> [was] <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> and a <S%G4556>sardius<s%> in <S%G3706>appearance;<s%> and [there was] a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> <S%G2943>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> an <S%G4664>emerald<s%> in <S%G3706>appearance.<s%>

And <S%G2943>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> [were] twenty-four <S%G2362>thrones;<s%> and upon the <S%G2362>thrones<s%> [I saw] twenty-four <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2521>sitting,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>garments,<s%> and <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> on their <S%G2776>heads.<s%>

And from the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G796>flashes<s%> of <S%G796>lightning<s%> and <S%G5456>sounds<s%> and <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder.<s%> And [there were] <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

and <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> [there was,] as it were, a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2930>crystal;<s%> and in the <S%G3319>center<s%> and <S%G2945>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> in <S%G1715>front<s%> and <S%G3693>behind.<s%>

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> [was] <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3023>lion,<s%> and the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3448>calf,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> that of a <S%G444>man,<s%> and the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> [was] <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G105>eagle.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures,<s%> <S%G2596>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G4420>wings,<s%> are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2943>around<s%> and <S%G2081>within;<s%> and <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> they do not <S%G372>cease<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G40>"Holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> [is] the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was and who is and who is to <S%G2064>come.<s%>"

And <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G2169>thanks<s%> to Him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> to Him who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%>

the twenty-four <S%G4245>elders<s%> will <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> Him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and will <S%G4352>worship<s%> Him who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> and will <S%G906>cast<s%> their <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G514>"Worthy<s%> <S%G1510>art<s%> Thou, our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and our <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1411>power;<s%> for Thou didst <S%G2936>create<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> of Thy <S%G2307>will<s%> they <S%G1510>existed,<s%> and were <S%G2936>created.<s%>"
